name: $::type
desc: Returns: Action  to take - permit or deny - when the rule conditions are met.  Not permitted in root rule, required in all nested rules.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Action  to take - permit or deny - when the rule conditions are met.  Not permitted in root rule, required in all nested rules.

name: $period
desc: Returns: The timeframe in this rule is valid.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: The timeframe in this rule is valid.

name: $actor
desc: Returns: Who or what is controlled by this rule. Use group to identify a set of actors by some property they share (e.g. 'admitting officers').

name: $addactor
desc: Who or what is controlled by this rule. Use group to identify a set of actors by some property they share (e.g. 'admitting officers').

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: Who or what is controlled by this rule. Use group to identify a set of actors by some property they share (e.g. 'admitting officers').

name: $action
desc: Returns: Actions controlled by this Rule.

name: $securityLabel
desc: Returns: A security label, comprised of 0..* security label fields (Privacy tags), which define which resources are controlled by this exception.

name: $addsecurityLabel
desc: A security label, comprised of 0..* security label fields (Privacy tags), which define which resources are controlled by this exception.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: A security label, comprised of 0..* security label fields (Privacy tags), which define which resources are controlled by this exception.

name: $purpose
desc: Returns: The context of the activities a user is taking - why the user is accessing the data - that are controlled by this rule.

name: $addpurpose
desc: The context of the activities a user is taking - why the user is accessing the data - that are controlled by this rule.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The context of the activities a user is taking - why the user is accessing the data - that are controlled by this rule.

name: $class
desc: Returns: The class of information covered by this rule. The type can be a FHIR resource type, a profile on a type, or a CDA document, or some other type that indicates what sort of information the consent relates to.

name: $addclass
desc: The class of information covered by this rule. The type can be a FHIR resource type, a profile on a type, or a CDA document, or some other type that indicates what sort of information the consent relates to.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The class of information covered by this rule. The type can be a FHIR resource type, a profile on a type, or a CDA document, or some other type that indicates what sort of information the consent relates to.

name: $code
desc: Returns: If this code is found in an instance, then the rule applies.

name: $addcode
desc: If this code is found in an instance, then the rule applies.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: If this code is found in an instance, then the rule applies.

name: $dataPeriod
desc: Returns: Clinical or Operational Relevant period of time that bounds the data controlled by this rule.

pvardefs.name: pValue
pvardefs.desc: Clinical or Operational Relevant period of time that bounds the data controlled by this rule.

name: $data
desc: Returns: The resources controlled by this rule if specific resources are referenced.

name: $adddata
desc: The resources controlled by this rule if specific resources are referenced.

lvardefs.name: objRef
lvardefs.desc: The resources controlled by this rule if specific resources are referenced.
